content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Duisburg, let's focus solely on discussing the rental price at this time. To begin negotiations, I propose a price of 1200 Euros per month. If you find this acceptable, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [1200] Euro!' But if you wish to continue discussing different terms, please provide a counteroffer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price proposal. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe with the apartment being newly built and its prime location in the city center, we could find a more competitive price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm convinced that my initial asking price accurately reflects the value of the property due to its exceptional features and location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
